findings.title: RM - Redundant Multiplication
findings.description: Unnecessary multiplication by 1 that does not change the value of a number.

findings.title: CR - Code Repetition
findings.description: The contract contains repetitive code segments, which can lead to issues like gas efficiency and complexity.

findings.title: DPI - Decimals Precision Inconsistency
findings.description: Inconsistencies in the decimals field handling across different ERC20 contracts can cause problems during interactions.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Declaring state variables as immutable can improve gas efficiency and reduce storage requirements.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Non-compliance with Solidity naming conventions can affect code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make the contract more difficult to understand, increase its size, and deployment cost.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Improper order of operations can cause loss of precision in arithmetic calculations.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Using uninitialized local variables can lead to unpredictable behavior and errors.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Missing checks for zero values in user-supplied input can cause problems during contract execution.
